review: This is everything and more than I could've hoped for. I really like how the Twitch.tv app is already on there, I dont even watch cable anymore now that I have my fire stick. I recommend this product to everyone! Down with chromecast & apple tv, UP WITH THE FIRE STICK!!!
author: Joseph Shaw

review: Wish it picked up Internet better.
author: Dore Ann

review: Apps are limited, youtube is not available as an oficial app, but the device is very fast and have an intuitive system.
author: Mauricio Sanchez

review: I love it and it's cheaper then cable or satellite

review: it needs to allow users to have kids profiles. for now, only your boxes do that.

review: Ongoing connectivity problems. Stick cannot establish good connection with WiFi. So far it has been useless as I cannot watch any programming.
